events.headline: INCIDENT
events.description: Highway 5 southbound is now open to one lane, 15 km north of Hope because of Collision. The right lane is closed for vehicle recovery. Expect delays. Updated on Tue Jun 12 6:22 am PDT. (ID# RTMC_17679) (Data by www.DriveBC.ca).
events.+ivr_message: Highway 5 southbound is now open to one lane, 15 km north of Hope because of Collision. The right lane is closed for vehicle recovery. Expect delays.

events.headline: INCIDENT
events.description: Highway 33, 8 km east of Kelowna is single lane alternating Monday to Friday from 7:00 AM through 6:00 PM. The road is fully open outside of those hours. Updated on Tue Jun 12 at 10:02 am PDT. (ID# 283518) (Data by www.DriveBC.ca).
events.+ivr_message: Highway 33, 8 km east of Kelowna is single lane alternating Monday to Friday from 7:00 AM through 6:00 PM.  The road is fully open outside of those hours Last updated on Tuesday June 12 at 10:02 am.
